ltl2rabin

Class GDRA

  • Object
    • ltl2rabin.Automaton<T,U>
      • ltl2rabin.RabinAutomaton<Pair<PropEquivalenceClass,List<SubAutomaton.State>>,Set<String>>
        • ltl2rabin.GDRA

  • public class GDRA
extends RabinAutomaton<Pair<PropEquivalenceClass,List<SubAutomaton.State>>,Set<String>>
    A GDRA object represents a generalized deterministic Rabin automaton. It can be constructed by a GDRAFactory. This class here does not provide any functionality except for storing the set of states, the acceptance sets, etc.

    This class inherits from the abstract Automaton class. GDRA states are labeled with a Pair<PropEquivalenceClass, List<SubAutomaton.State>>. Letters are of type Set<String>.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GDRA

        public GDRA(ImmutableSet<? extends RabinAutomaton.State<Pair<PropEquivalenceClass,List<SubAutomaton.State>>,Set<String>>> states,
            RabinAutomaton.State<Pair<PropEquivalenceClass,List<SubAutomaton.State>>,Set<String>> initialState,
            Set<Set<Pair<Set<GDRA.Transition>,Set<GDRA.Transition>>>> rabinCondition,
            ImmutableSet<Set<String>> alphabet)
        Once created, a GDRA can not be changed.
        Parameters:
        states - The immutable set of all GDRA.States of this automaton.
        initialState - The initial GDRA.State
        rabinCondition - The set that represents the generalized rabin condition
        alphabet - The alphabet the automaton runs on. A letter has the type Set<String>.
